prerequisites.why: Understanding basic vocabulary is essential for comprehending texts.
Knowing sentence structure helps in understanding the flow of information.

roadmap_steps.objective: Understand basic reading strategies
Practice identifying main ideas
Improve vocabulary through context clues
Read and summarize short passages
Review and practice comprehension exercises

resources.description: An introduction to reading comprehension strategies.

resources.title: Reading Comprehension Strategies
resources.description: Strategies for improving reading comprehension.

resources.title: BBC Bitesize Reading Comprehension
resources.description: Interactive exercises and tips for better reading comprehension.

resources.title: Reading Comprehension Practice
resources.description: Practice exercises to improve reading comprehension.

prerequisites.why: Understanding basic vocabulary is essential for grasping grammar rules.

roadmap_steps.objective: Understand the basic parts of speech.
Learn about sentence structure and types.
Practice identifying and correcting common grammatical errors.
Write a short paragraph demonstrating correct grammar usage.

resources.title: Introduction to Grammar
resources.description: An introduction to the basic concepts of grammar.

resources.title: Parts of Speech
resources.description: A detailed explanation of the different parts of speech.

resources.title: Sentence Structure
resources.description: Learn about the structure of sentences and how to construct them correctly.

resources.title: Grammar Practice Exercises
resources.description: Practice exercises to reinforce grammar concepts.

prerequisites.why: Understanding basic grammar is essential for effective writing.
Knowing how to structure sentences properly improves clarity.

roadmap_steps.objective: Learn basic grammar rules
Practice sentence structure
Write a short paragraph
Review and edit the paragraph

resources.title: Basic Grammar Rules
resources.description: Learn the fundamental rules of grammar.

resources.title: Sentence Structure Guide
resources.description: Understand the different types of sentence structures.

resources.title: Writing Tips
resources.description: Tips and tricks for improving your writing skills.

resources.title: Grammar Practice
resources.description: Practice exercises to reinforce grammar concepts.

prerequisites.why: To understand and analyze literary texts effectively.

roadmap_steps.objective: Understand the basics of literature and its history.
Learn about different genres and literary devices.
Analyze and interpret literary texts.

resources.title: Introduction to Literature
resources.description: A comprehensive introduction to literature and its history.

resources.title: Literary Devices and Genres
resources.description: An article explaining various literary devices and genres.

resources.title: Literary Analysis Guide
resources.description: A guide to analyzing and interpreting literary texts.

prerequisites.why: To identify and analyze the techniques used in poetry
To understand the content and context of poems

roadmap_steps.objective: Understand basic poetic terms and devices
Read and analyze sample poems
Practice identifying poetic devices in poems
Write a short analysis of a poem

resources.title: Introduction to Poetry
resources.description: A beginner-friendly introduction to poetry and its elements

resources.description: A step-by-step guide to analyzing poems

resources.title: Poetic Terms and Definitions
resources.description: A comprehensive glossary of poetic terms

resources.title: Poetry Analysis Practice
resources.description: Practice analyzing poems with interactive exercises

prerequisites.why: Understanding grammar is essential for constructing clear and coherent sentences in your essay.
Improving your reading skills will help you understand different essay structures and styles.

roadmap_steps.objective: Understand the basic structure of an essay.
Learn how to write a thesis statement.
Practice writing body paragraphs.
Learn how to write a conclusion.
Revise and edit your essay.

resources.title: Introduction to Essay Writing
resources.description: A comprehensive introduction to essay writing, covering the basic structure and key components.

resources.title: How to Write a Thesis Statement
resources.description: A detailed guide on how to write an effective thesis statement for your essay.

resources.title: Essay Writing Tips
resources.description: Tips and strategies for improving your essay writing skills.

resources.title: Essay Writing Practice
resources.description: Practice exercises to help you apply what you've learned about essay writing.

prerequisites.why: Understanding grammar is essential for constructing clear and effective letters.

roadmap_steps.objective: Understand the structure of a formal letter.
Learn the key components of a formal letter.
Practice writing a formal letter.

resources.title: How to Write a Formal Letter
resources.description: A comprehensive guide on writing formal letters, including structure and key components.

resources.title: Writing a Formal Letter
resources.description: A video tutorial on writing formal letters, covering all essential aspects.

resources.title: Formal Letter Writing Practice
resources.description: Practice exercises to improve your formal letter writing skills.

global_recommendations.notes: Focus on foundational writing & comprehension skills.
